name: Secret Key Pendant
description:
Our gorgeous Heaven Eleven jewellery by Dutch designers is hand made especially for you!

This is a beautiful hand carved bone secret key pendant sitting on a double silver plated ball chain of 100mm.

Available in black and white bone.

As our Heaven Eleven range is hand made to order there may be a 10 - 14 day delivery time.

name: Heart Pendant
description:
Our gorgeous Heaven Eleven jewellery by Dutch designers is hand made especially for you!

This is a beautiful hand carved bone heart pendant sitting on a double silver plated ball chain of 100mm.

Angel wing pendant also available.

As our Heaven Eleven range is hand made to order there may be a 10 - 14 day delivery time.

name: Boho Angel Wing Necklace
description:
Our gorgeous Heaven Eleven jewellery by Dutch designers is hand made especially for you!  This is a beautiful precious stone necklace with hand carved bone angel wing. The necklace is 100mm long and available in Sunstone or Amazonite.

In beautiful shades of reddish browns and cream, Sunstone is said to promote extra energy under stress and self-healing.

Pale blue Amazonite creates a feeling of power, It inspires truth, sincerity, honor, self love and communication.

As our Heaven Eleven range is hand made to order there may be a 10 - 14 day delivery time.

name: Iris Smoke Bead Necklace
description:
This gorgeous necklace is handmade from beautiful translucent smoke glass beads threaded with deep indigo ribbon.

Size: Long Necklace 114cm

name: Moss Stitch Throw
description:
These lovely cotton throws are incredibly tactile, knitted from cotton with a loose stitch known as 'moss stitch'. They are available in 2 muted shades of Stone and Pewter and, as they are made from cotton can even go in the washing machine, but it still pays to use a gentle wash.

There are lovely cushions available to add to the cosy!

Size: 125cm x 180cm

Our Accessories and At Home products are inspired by the traditional skills of artisans throughout Africa and India. They combine contemporary designs with age-old techniques, natural materials and sustainable methods of production to ensure each product is truly exceptional.

name: Moss Stitch Cushions
description:
These deliciously soft cotton moss stitch cushion covers are heavenly, simply add one of our gorgeous moss stitch throws and you'll never leave the house again. Available in Stone and Pewter.

Size:  40cm x 40cm (48cm x 48cm inner, available separately)

Our Accessories and At Home products are inspired by the traditional skills of artisans throughout Africa and India. They combine contemporary designs with age-old techniques, natural materials and sustainable methods of production to ensure each product is truly exceptional.

name: Tembo Ceramic Hook
description:
These gorgeous ceramic hooks look fantastic either on their own or all in a row, and they add a bit of life to you everyday clothes hook.

Currently available in Black and Green, Please contact us for other colours.

Size: 16cm (length)

Our Accessories and At Home products inspired by the traditional skills of artisans throughout Africa and India. They combine contemporary designs with age-old techniques, natural materials and sustainable methods of production to ensure each product is truly exceptional.

name: Asanta Platter
description:
These beautiful reclaimed platters are vintage pieces. Their rustic finish and traditional style make each one unique. They come in a variety of colours and sizes. Traditionally used for serving and sharing food they make wonderful platters and stylish centre pieces. 

Currently available in Distressed White and Distressed Jade.

Sizes vary from 30cm-34cm in diameter, No two are the same.

name: Hanging Tealight Holder - Large
description:
These sweet T light jars are available in two sizes.  Each one has a little wire handle so you can hang them from branches in the garden.

Size:  
Small Traditional 8cm (height) x 6cm (diamater)
Large Traditional 11cm (height) x 7cm (diamater)

Our glass is recycled. Although glass is one of the most harmless materials produced by the world, this is because it is essentially made of raw materials; it does not break down in landfill.  Recycling glass not only saves energy (50% less energy that that required making new glass) but is an ongoing process, as glass can be recycled continually. This means we can create new beautiful and useful objects with less impact on our environment.

name: Bird Hooks
description:
These charming bird hooks look wonderful wherever you hang them. Available in distressed white.

Size: 36.5cm x 12cm

name: Birdy Door Stop
description:
These charming hand carved wooden bird door stops add a delightful touch to a home. Available in distressed white.

Size: 19cm x 7cm x 6cm

The mango wood used is sustainable and FSC certified. Mango trees are initially grown for their fruit but once the trees reach a certain size and age, they stop bearing fruit. It is then that the trees can be cut down and used to create wood products. The removal of the old trees makes space for farmers to plant new mango trees.  This not only means that none of the wood is wasted but offers a supplementary income to mango wood farmers.

name: Bandhura Linen Scarf
description:
These long floaty, pure linen scarves are hand woven with a loose weave pattern at each end. They also look great worn intertwined together.

These come in Off White or Light Grey.

Size: 70x200cm

Our Accessories and At Home products inspired by the traditional skills of artisans throughout Africa and India. They combine contemporary designs with age-old techniques, natural materials and sustainable methods of production to ensure each product is truly exceptional.

name: Boho Buddha Bracelet
description:
Our gorgeous Heaven Eleven jewellery by Dutch designers is hand made especially for you!

This is a gorgeous silver bead bracelet with a buddha charm and pretty toggle clasp. This looks great layered with our silver bead or freshwater pearl bracelet. The bracelet measures 7.5 inches and the little buddha is just over 1cm in diameter.

'A Buddha’s compassion, wisdom, and power are completely beyond conception'. A lovely present idea!

Because these are handmade, it could take up to 10 days for delivery but if we have what you require in stock, it will be delivered within 2-5 days as usual.

name: Boho Heart Bracelet
description:
Our gorgeous Heaven Eleven jewellery by Dutch designers is hand made especially for you!

This beautiful bracelet is silver beads with gorgeous mother of pearl heart charm. Simple and stylish it matches our Boho Heart Pendant perfectly. The bracelet is 7 inches in length and the heart is 2 cm.

Because these are handmade, it could take up to 10 days for delivery but if we have what you require in stock, it will be delivered within 2-5 days as usual.

name: Boho Heart Pendant
description:
Our gorgeous Heaven Eleven jewellery by Dutch designers is hand made especially for you! 

This is a beautiful and simple mother of pearl and sterling silver heart of 2cm, with a cute Heaven Eleven charm and pendent of pretty mother of pearls and a little cross. 

This can be worn long at 52cm or doubled at the neck if you prefer, two looks in one necklace!

name: Boho Leather Purse Bag - Chocolate & Gold
description:
We are really excited about this new range of gorgeous real leather purse bags. They are very versatile and stylish. You can use them as a purse, a shoulder bag or wear it around your neck when you want all your hands free!  The strap is easily removable.

Available in chocolate & gold or silver & tan with a utility styling they come with a lovely heart charm and clip. You could add your own bag charms to it very easily to make it entirely your own.  These are really unique!

name: Boho Pearl and Heart Necklace
description:
Our gorgeous Heaven Eleven jewellery by Dutch designers is hand made especially for you! 

This is a really stunning long necklace of fresh water silver pearls and mother of pearl heart pendant along with the tan leather tag. An extra string of pearls and pretty mother of pearl cross finishes this really unique necklace.  It could also be worn double up at the neck. One of a kind!

This necklace hangs 18 inches and is 36 inches in total length. The Heart pendant is 2 inches at the widest part.

name: Boho Buddha Necklace - Mother of Pearl Turquoise
description:
Our gorgeous Heaven Eleven jewellery by Dutch designers is hand made especially for you! 

These gorgeous 55cm long necklaces are made with beautiful mother of pearl and bright turquoise beads, sterling silver clasp and sterling silver buddha.  They really are stunning!  Also available is a wrap bracelet to match.

'Our gorgeous Heaven Eleven jewellery by Dutch designers is hand made especially for you! 

These gorgeous 55cm long necklaces are made with beautiful mother of pearl and bright pink agate beads, sterling silver clasp and gorgeous sterling silver buddha.  They really are stunning!

'turquoise will protect the wearer from negative energy and bring good fortune. The turquoise is the symbol of friendship and It also brings peace to the home..'

As our Heaven Eleven range is hand made to order there may be a 10 - 14 day delivery time.

name: Buddha Boho Necklace - Garnet
description:
Our gorgeous Heaven Eleven jewellery by Dutch designers is hand made especially for you! 

These gorgeous 55cm long necklaces are made with gorgeous garnet and howlite beads, sterling silver clasp and gorgeous sterling silver buddha.  They really are stunning!

'Garnet is the stone of love & devotion - to your family, your friends, yourself, and your purpose or goals. Garnet will stimulate the senses, and increase your vitality and stamina' 

As our Heaven Eleven range is hand made to order there may be a 10- 14 day delivery time.
